page.title: 11Recreation and Leisure
page.content: There are few leisure facilities in the area. For adults there are two licensed clubs,one pub and a football pitch.Children's facilities include a small playground for young children, mini rugby and soccer pitches,and a small BMX cycle area.There is plenty of common and woodland around the village.The local fishing club have stocked the River Sirhowy with trout. 68% of the adults regularly make use of the clubs and pub.Because of the limited leisure facilities 39% of the children play games to do with sport. The most popular being football and rounders. 22% of the children enjoy cycling around the village and lanes or using the BMX track.Only 4% of those inter- viewed swim regularly because of the need to travel as the village has no swimming pool or leisure centre.
